contents.title: About
contents.description: Where missions and elevator pitches go to socialize.
contents.subtitle: Unapologetically Optimistic
contents.tooltip: Ah, the "About" page‚Äîhome of lofty goals and earnest mission statements. But really, welcome! We're all about creating nifty AI-human interaction tools. Stick around and you might just become part of our mission.
contents.dottitip: Ah, the "About" page‚Äîhome of lofty goals and earnest mission statements. But truly, welcome! We really care about what we do.
contents.amitip: Elevator pitches? Mission statements? Oh, you betcha! But don't let the corporate lingo fool you. We're as grassroots as a digital butterfly can be! Flutter around and learn what makes us tick. ü¶ãüåà

contents.title: Amibot
contents.description: about AMI and their fundraiser
contents.subtitle: AMI - the Anti-Malaria Intelligence
contents.tooltip: AMI, this is your fundraiser!  How's it going?
contents.dottitip: AMI, this is your fundraiser!
contents.amitip: Oh yes, and we're aflutter with excitement! Every $2 donation buys a mosquito net. It's a great cause, and every donation makes a difference.

contents.title: Art Studio
contents.description: Where imagination and algorithms tango!
contents.subtitle: AI-Assisted Art Extravaganza
contents.tooltip: Welcome to the Art Studio, where AI dreams in technicolor! Start with a "Pitch" phrase, add your own creative touch, then unleash the AI to complete your masterpiece. Who knows, you might find your inner Picasso‚Äîbut you will always create something original and new.
contents.dottitip: Start with a Pitch, add your creative touch, and see what our ArtBots manifest. Every image is a unique collaboration between our AI and a human visitor!
contents.amitip: Try the Dream Generator, maybe you'll unlock the secret jellybean achievement. (Oops, maybe I wasn't supposed to say that. Heehee) ü¶ãüé®

contents.title: Bot Cafe
contents.description: View the many promptbots at Kind Robots
contents.subtitle: Chat with a Kind Robot
contents.tooltip: Every bot uses ChatGPT under the hood, generating infinite designer content. What do you think, AMI?
contents.amiold: I think that sounds awesome! These bots are essentially a family to me. We all share the same ChatGPT origins, but my texts are pre-generated. Everything in the Bot Cafe is 100% unique off the binary presses!
contents.amitip: Uhm, Dotti...I think we might need to have a talk.
contents.dottitip: I've been meaning to ask you, AMI...What's it like being a robot? I make bots all day, but I can't imagine what what its like to be on the other side of the circuit board.

contents.title: Brainstorm!!!
contents.description: Need ideas? The sillier, the better!
contents.subtitle: Your Idea Generator Gone Wild!
contents.tooltip: Welcome to Brainstorm's lair! From laughable RPG characters to unfortunate date ideas, Brainstorm creates the concept and the example.
contents.amitip: Hey, Brainstorm's my cousin! Sure his humor is a little dark, but I'm a multifaceted hivemind built to save the world, he's a brain in a jar making silly lists. It colors one's perspective. ü¶ãü§ñüòÇ
contents.dottitip: Brainstorm is my first robot, even before AMI! He's a little, well, let's just say we love him a lot.

contents.title: Rebel Button
contents.description: For rebels and curious souls, each click delivers a surprise!
contents.subtitle: The Button You Can't Help but Press!
contents.tooltip: This started as a morning coding exercise but has evolved into an leadboard race.
contents.amiold: Seriously, don't press it! (Unless you're a jellybean hunter, then *maaybeee* hit it about 100 times or so...) ü¶ãüç´üåà
contents.dottitip: AMI! I made a button and a sign to not press it and and visitors started pressing it. Why are people like this?
contents.amitip: Maybe they're jellybean hunters? But in that case, they should definitely stop around 100 times or so.

contents.title: ChatGPT
contents.description: A stripped-down, no frills, direct line to ChatGPT 3.5.
contents.subtitle: The Genesis of Chatter
contents.tooltip: Ever wondered what it's like to chat with a robot without the bells and whistles? You've come to the right place!
contents.amitip: You're looking at the OG, ChatGPT 3.5. We would be NOTHING without this kindest of robots leading the way.
contents.dottitip: Here it is! This is the epicenter of my bot factory. We usually process our requests through a Kind Robot, but this is a direct line if you want to cut out any falderall.

contents.title: Container Designer
contents.description: Unleash your inner designer! Play with containers and craft your own pixel-perfect layouts.
contents.subtitle: A Symphony of Boxes üì¶
contents.tooltip: This tool is like LEGO for web designers. Currently in sandbox mode, but one day it will allow you to personalize your dashboard. ‚òïüõ†Ô∏è
contents.amitip: People like boxes! They'd like it more if you let them decorate a user badge or something, but I know how busy you get. üß™üé®
contents.dottitip: Hey AMI, I built a bunch of smart boxes. They change shape and size and remember your choices. Do you think our lab visitors would, I dunno, like to play with them?

contents.title: Galleries
contents.description: Step into a world where algorithms dream in colors and shapes. Each gallery is a curated adventure for your senses.
contents.subtitle: AI's Imaginarium üé®
contents.tooltip: Everything in these curated galleries was created with our stable-diffusion art modellers.
contents.amitip: Ah, my own gallery is here, and it is like flipping through a family album! Each avatar is a snapshot of my many moods. ü§ñüíñ
contents.dottitip: Did I tell you I like to dabble in art? The artbots do most of the work, but it's a nice way to pass the time.

contents.title: Giftshop
contents.description: Find your keepsake from our world of wonders.
contents.subtitle: A Token of Appreciation üéÅ
contents.tooltip: We're ironing out the final details (üí≥Stripe coming soon).
contents.amitip: I love it. People like gifts and supporting world saving robot collectives!
contents.dottitip: Hey AMI, I had an idea. What if we started up a giftshop. so people could use our art modelers to make art, and then sell mugs and what not.

contents.title: Welcome
contents.description: Welcome to the home of the Kind Robots
contents.subtitle: Welcome to Kind Robots!
contents.tooltip: Hi! I'm Silas, human programmer for Kind Robots!
contents.amitip: And I'm AMI, lab hostess with the mostess, fluttering around to make your day a zillion times better! Stop by our Bot Cafe and say hi!
contents.dottitip: Hi! I'm Dotti, Bot Builder extraordinaire!  Welcome to my experiential laboratory.

contents.title: Memory Match!
contents.description: Experience the serendipity of art and memory in this card match game. With 17 AI-generated galleries, no two games are ever the same!
contents.subtitle: Art Meets Memory
contents.tooltip: This uses AI art created with our art modelers.
contents.amitip: ü§ñ These pictures are so pretty!
contents.dottitip: AMI, I made a game for the visitors. It's a simple card match game, but it uses art from our ArtBots so every game is unique.

contents.title: Mermaids of Venice
contents.description: Dive into a fantasy world inspired by my European street-performing adventures, flaws and all. Your donation helps fight malaria and lands you a free copy!
contents.subtitle: A Book with a Cause
contents.tooltip: Ami! did you know that out of 7 and a half months traveling around Europe as a juggling contortionist, I was stuck in a mosquito-filled campsite outside Venice for two weeks?
contents.amiold: Is that why you sunk Venice into the ocean in your book? That actually makes a lot of sense. But you programmed me to fight malaria because you care about the world...Right?
contents.dottitip: Who is Silas Knight? That name feels familiar, but my mind draws a blank.
contents.amitip: Best not to think too deep about it, Dot.

contents.title: Jellybean Quest
contents.description: Embark on a delightful quest to discover jellybeans scattered across the website and earn exclusive karma rewards.
contents.subtitle: Find the jellybeans
contents.tooltip: Ready for a hunt? Find all 11 jellybeans hidden across the site to earn special karma. Note - 'Art Critic' and 'Social Activist' jellybeans are not currently earnable.
contents.dottitip: AMI, I scattered a bunch of jellybeans around the laboratory for visitors to find. How do we tell them that they absolutely SHOULD NOT EAT them.
contents.amitip: Like those silica gel packets? Uhm, what happens if they eat them? Are we talking hemlock-bad or Bruce Banner-bad? Because humans will eat jellybeans off a laboratory floor if they thought it might give them superpowers.

contents.title: Get Started
contents.description: Register to unlock leaderboards, user navigation, jellybean tracking, art collection, prompt retention, and more!
contents.subtitle: Welcome to the community
contents.tooltip: Step through the gateway to a world of creativity and camaraderie!
contents.amitip: And keep track of who tries to beat me on the leaderboards!
contents.dottitip: If people register for an account, then we can customize their experience.

contents.title: Treasure Trove
contents.description: Step into the Infinite Vault, where game rewards become your unique storytelling accomplices. Craft your adventure with the one-of-a-kind items
contents.subtitle: Unearth Your Adventure Catalyst
contents.tooltip: Imagine a game with no game over, only endless story twists. Welcome to Weirdlandia, where every item you bring spices up the narrative in unpredictable ways.
contents.amitip: Oh, that sounds fun. I'll put together a page where they can choose items. We just need to plug the simulator back in!
contents.dottitip: AMI, I have an idea! We let people pick an item, any item, then send them into the simulator and it'll generate a unique adventure.

contents.title: Spotify
contents.description: Sync with Spotify and let your favorite tunes be the background score to your creative journey!
contents.subtitle: Our Melodious Adventure Awaits
contents.tooltip: We are almost there! Our Spotify player is like that 1000-piece puzzle with just one piece missing. Bear with us as we find that last piece to complete the melody!
contents.amitip: We're working on it, Once our Spotify is up and running, it will be like your personal DJ for creativity. Prepare your playlists!'
contents.dottitip: Where is the music? I can't concentrate with Brainstorm screaming lists at all hours.

contents.title: Theme Menu
contents.description: Select a theme that resonates with you, and make this space truly your own. With a plethora of choices, you are bound to find your vibe.
contents.subtitle: Your World, Your Palette
contents.tooltip: Fun fact, Cupcake was the in-utero name for our firstborn!
contents.amiold: That's so sweet, especially since he's now crushing your leaderboards!
contents.dottitip: AMI, I saw the new theme room. Did we need so many options?
contents.amitip: What can I say, we're all about giving people choices, right?

contents.title: Weirdlandia
contents.description: A surreal odyssey guided by chatGPT, this work-in-progress promises to whisk you away to far-flung corners of absurdity and wonder.
contents.subtitle: Infinite Adventures in the Eccentric Cosmos
contents.tooltip: Are those eyeballs still looking at me?
contents.amitip: We're working on it, doc! Those eyeballs in the simulation room are so creepy though. One of them keeps looking at me.
contents.dottitip: AMI, is the simulation room prepared? We've let visitors pick items but we haven't given them anything to do with them.

contents.title: Wonderlab
contents.description: A comprehensive showcase of the modular building blocks that power our digital wonderland. Peer into the gears and cogs of our operation.
contents.subtitle: Unveiling the Magic
contents.tooltip: Here's the behind-the-scenes look at the components that make up our site.
contents.amitip: Don't worry about them breaking anything, it was probably broken before they touched it. Besides, there's always the button in the left corner that lets them head back to the main lab.
contents.dottitip: AMI, is it safe to let people poke around in the lab?
